data.message: This is so beautiful it really brought joy to my heart I want to know more about this

replies.message: Hi there, Mona. We're happy to hear you enjoyed the video. #GivingTuesday is a global day dedicated to giving back. It is a day that charities, families, businesses, community centers, and students around the world come together for one common purpose: to celebrate generosity and to give. For more information, visit: http://on.fb.me/1XG9ReD. -Kate
